title: Consent String
description: Consent String as presented by user along with standard information to help consent enforcer to parse the String.

consentStandard.title: Standard for the consent
consentStandard.description: This helps determine the format of the consent string as set by consent management services.

consentStandardVersion.title: Standards Version
consentStandardVersion.description: Standards version to accurately define the format of the consent string as set by consent management services.

consentStringValue.title: Consent String
consentStringValue.description: Full consent string as provided by consent management services. Standard and Version help define how to parse this string.

gdprApplies.title: GDPR Applies
gdprApplies.description: If this is true, it means this consent string needs to be processed for consent enforcement.

containsPersonalData.title: Contains personal data
containsPersonalData.description: If this is true, it means consent is coming with personal data.
